amendment.description: See Forbes motion to recommit with instructions for amendment explanation.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds for the transfer or release of individuals detained at United States Station, Guantanamo Bay, Cuba.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Skelton amendment (A024) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A024) offered by Mr. Skelton.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Skelton amendment (A024) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Skelton amendment (A024) Agreed to by voice vote.
